name: Guanshan.github.com
tagline: A modern personal site template for GitHub Pages.
body:
### Custom Template
This repository now hosts a handcrafted, modern personal homepage. Update `index.html` to personalise sections such as About, Projects, Experience, and Contact.

### Styling
All visual styles live in `stylesheets/styles.css` so you can easily adjust typography, colors, or layout. The built-in theme switcher stores user preference in localStorage.

### Deploying
Push changes to `main` (or the branch configured for GitHub Pages) and the site will automatically update at `https://guanshan.github.io`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
